script:
1). The food here is supposed to be of a very high standard.
Let's try some then and find out. 
Most people go to the less expensive restaurant on the other side of the road.
I always think it's worth paying extra if the food is good.
2). Do you think anyone is going to come and ask us what we want to eat?
I'm really so hungry today that I could eat a horse.
There are three waiters on duty today.
I'm sure a waiter will come along in a minute. 
3). Are you going to choose something from the main menu or from the 'specials' one?
I think I'll go for the more expensive dishes on the main menu. 
My favourite dish isn't on the menu today.
Last time I came here it cost me a fortune.
